quotes.quote: Forget the past, it's gone, but glance back occasionally to remind yourself where you came from and where you are going.
Sooner or later we've all got to let go of our past.
It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.
I think looking forward will be better than looking back.
Looking forward to things is half the pleasure of them. You mayn't get the things themselves; but nothing can prevent you from having the fun of looking forward to them.
You've gotta know when it's time to turn the page.
There will be many challenges ahead, and I'm looking forward to them.
Always look ahead, but never look back.
Sometimes you have to forget what's gone. Appreciate what still remains. And look foward to what's coming next.
To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
I'm looking forward, that's all, I'm not looking backwards.
It was a challenging experience. I'm looking forward to a break.
Life moves on and so should we.
The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
Sometimes you have to take a step back to move forward.
I can't take back the past, but I can fight for the future.
Sorrow is properly that state of the mind in which our desires are fixed upon the past without looking forward to the future.
I'm just always looking forwards. I spend very little time, looking backwards.
I'm really looking forward to, not more of the same, but a continual growth.
Where you are, right here and now, this is how bad stories end. But it's also how the best stories, begin.
We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it.
I'm really looking forward to a time when generations after us look back and say how ridiculous it was that humans were driving cars.
Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
I am looking forward to getting to do things I have never done before.
Look at your neck turning radius. Its designed to look 180 deg forward side only. Looking back slows you down. Always look forward in life.
Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
You can't look back; you have to keep looking forward.
Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
